item.title: Integrácia
item.description: Integration by parts: $\int u \ dv=uv-\int v \ du$ u-substitution: $\int cos(2x+1)\ dx$ $u=2x+1$ $du=2\ dx \implies dx=\frac{1}{2}du$ $\int \frac{cos(u)}{2}\ du$

item.title: Multivariable kalkulus
item.description: Derivovanie Divergence and curl: Iba pre vektorové funkcie $$\vec{v}(x,y,…)=\begin{bmatrix}v_x(x,y)\v_y(x,y)\\dot{\dot{.}}\end{bmatrix}$$ $$\text{div} \ \vec{v}(x,y,…)=\nabla\cdot\vec{v}=\frac{\delta v_x}{\delta x}+\frac{\delta v_y}{\delta y}+…$$ $$\text{2d-curl} \ \vec{v}(x,y)=\nabla\times\vec{v}=\frac{\delta v_x}{\delta x}-\frac{\delta v_y}{\delta y}$$

item.title: Periodické fukcie
item.description: Funkcia je periodcká práve vtedy $\exists\ p \in \mathbb{R^+_0}, k \in \mathbb{Z}$ a) ak $x\in D(f)$, tak aj $x+pk \in D(f)$
